DOC.brief_summary: Spinocerebellar ataxia ( SCA ) hereditary disorder movement incoordination . The ataxia perform low intra-cortical facilitation mainly due degenerative cerebellum . Noninvasive sensory stimulation peripheral electrical stimulation report modulate excitability motor excitability . This study aim investigate effect NMES motor excitability SCA , differentiation central peripheral motor excitability change NMES .
DOC.brief_title: Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation Median Nerve Facilitates Low Motor Cortex Excitability Human With Spinocerebellar Ataxia
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Spinocerebellar ataxia No history epilepsy No neuromuscular disorder No fracture within last six month restrict movement upper extremity Limited trembling hand allow EMG recording .
